Hello! I would like to try out some changes that are yet to be merged into mathlib master in a local project. In particular, I'd like to play around with #17198 which lives in the kaehler_is_base_change branch.
I'm using leanproject for my project, and using leanproject upgrade-mathlib and leanproject get-mathlib-cache to manage mathlib versions. However, this doesn't seem to allow for any options which specify mathlib branch.

You can edit the leanpkg.toml file by hand to specify a commit, just change the rev parameter to the commit you want in the lines:

[dependencies]
mathlib = {git = "https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib", rev = "8c812fd49c82a071648641af2f12a79a720a4254"}
Calvin Lee has marked this topic as resolved.
